definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: What Chastain was wearing was, in fact, a prototype for the Nike Inner Actives range of sports underwear.
sentences.chinese: 其實，查斯頓穿的是耐克運動內衣系列的樣品。

sentences.english: Nike Inc. had a "creative community" for sharing creative works.
sentences.chinese: 耐克公司則通過“創意社區”共享“創意作品”。

sentences.english: I want a pair of Nikes.
sentences.chinese: 我要買一雙耐克運動鞋。

sentences.english: He was wearing a black blazer and white Nikes.
sentences.chinese: 他穿一件黑色運動夾克，腳蹬白色耐克鞋。

sentences.english: The Nike shox has a slot beneath the cushion that lines the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 耐克彈力柱鞋在鞋墊下方有一個狹縫。

sentences.english: Sure, 18-year-olds in urban China are wearing American Nikes.
sentences.chinese: 當然，中國城市裏18歲的年輕人在穿美國的耐克。

sentences.english: The Cheap nike shoes costless fast suit is severely an extraordinary sneaker.
sentences.chinese: 快速的西裝是免費的耐克運動鞋嚴重不尋常的。

sentences.english: How does that differ from the brand strategy before Converse was acquired by Nike?
sentences.chinese: 在被耐克接手之前，匡威的品牌戰略有何不同？

sentences.english: Broadly speaking it may cost as little to manufacture a pair of Nikes as another trainer.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，可能成本少，生產的另一個教練的耐克鞋。

sentences.english: I saw this nigger in Nikes running down the road with a huge TV in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 我看見有個穿着耐克的黑人抱着臺電視在路上跑。

sentences.english: One of the guys takes out a pair of "Nikes" from his bag and starts to put them on.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一個人從包裏拿出一雙“耐克”鞋，開始穿上。

sentences.english: We are leading company that wholesales brand shoes, mainly Nike shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司主要產品銷售領先品牌鞋，耐克鞋爲主。

sentences.english: I broached the subject with mike in english.
sentences.chinese: 英語課上我跟耐克提了這件事。

sentences.english: The Nike training shoe USB flash drive has a 1GB storage capacity.
sentences.chinese: 這個耐克訓練鞋樣的U盤有1G的存儲容量。

sentences.english: With Liu out, Nike's advertising loses some of its punch, Renner said.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾表示，隨着劉翔的退出，耐克的廣告多少失去些。

sentences.english: Several Nike shoes will accommodate this special kit.
sentences.chinese: 一些耐克鞋將容納這個特殊的工具包。

definition: to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
